metadata.title: CVE-2015-8856 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the serve-index package before 1.6.3 for Node.js allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted file or directory name.

criterions.comment: node-serve-index package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1').
